name: HsnUltrasoundDICOM
author: hansono
description:
A library to send ultrasound images to a DICOM supported server or query patients/studies.
Imebra DICOM Library was used internally.

childs.name: Global
childs.description: Global Method of HsnUltrasoundDICOM

childs.name: initialize
childs.description: intialize library

childs.name: release
childs.description: release library

childs.name: isInitialized
childs.description: check if library is initialized

childs.name: Configuration
childs.description: Settings required to communicate with the dicom server

childs.name: Parsable
childs.description: a interface to stringify class or parse string to object

childs.name: stringify
childs.description: stringfy this object to json format.

childs.name: parse
childs.description: parse a json format string to this object
childs.return: whether the function execution is successful

childs.name: ClientConfiguration
childs.description: DICOM-related settings for the current device

childs.name: applicationEntityTitle
childs.description: Application Entity Title of DICOM Client

childs.name: readTimeout
childs.description: How long to wait for a read request

childs.name: writeTimeout
childs.description: How long to wait for a write request

childs.name: imageTransferMode
childs.description: Image Transfer Mode of DICOM Server.

childs.name: NetworkConfiguration
childs.description: Network settings on the local machine

childs.name: ServerConfiguration
childs.description: Basic settings for communicating with the server, such as IP, PORT, etc.

childs.name: alias
childs.description: Alias of DICOM server

childs.name: ipAddress
childs.description: IP of DICOM server

childs.name: port
childs.description: Port of DICOM server

childs.name: applicationEntityTitle
childs.description: Application Entity Title of DICOM Server

childs.name: maxRetries
childs.description: max trial of the request for the server

childs.name: DIMSETimeout
childs.description:
Time-out for DIMSE messages.
Default value is unlimited

childs.name: StorageServerConfiguration
childs.description: Settings for DICOM Storage Server

childs.name: imageMode
childs.description: Image mode for dicom

childs.name: StorageCommitmentServerConfiguration
childs.description: Settings for DICOM Storage Commitment Server

childs.name: ModalityWorklistServerConfiguration
childs.description: Settings for DICOM Modality Worklist Server

childs.name: MPPSServerConfiguration
childs.description: Settings for DICOM MPPS Server

childs.name: Server
childs.description: A set of classes for communicating with the DICOM server

childs.name: Server
childs.description: Provides an interface to the ability to validate connections.

childs.name: verify
childs.description: verify communication with server

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to be verifed the connection

childs.name: StorageServer
childs.description: A class that provides the function to save images to a DICOM server.

childs.name: queueImage
childs.description: Stack the images to be sent in the queue

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to send images

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: ultrasound image to put in the queue

childs.name: sendImage
childs.description: Send images stacked in the queue

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to send images

childs.name: StorageCommitmentServer
childs.description: A class that provides the function to commit images to a DICOM server.

childs.name: checkImageCommitment
childs.description: Check that the sent image is saved on the server.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to check if the image is committed

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: ultrasound images to check the images

parameters.name: success_images
parameters.description: ultrasound images that store successfully in the server

parameters.name: failed_images
parameters.description: ultrasound images that fail to store in the server

childs.name: ModalityWorklistServer
childs.description: A class that provides the function to query patient information or study information

childs.name: listPatients
childs.description: Get patient information  that meets the filter query

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to query

childs.name: listStudies
childs.description: Get studies information that meets the filter query.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to query

childs.name: openStudy
childs.description: open the study.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to query

childs.name: updateStudy
childs.description: open the study.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The configuration of the server to which user want to query

childs.name: Type
childs.description: Types used by this library

childs.name: HsnDate
childs.description: data type for date

childs.name: year
childs.description: year

childs.name: month
childs.description: month

childs.name: day
childs.description: day

childs.name: hour
childs.description: hour

childs.name: minute
childs.description: minute

childs.name: second
childs.description: second

childs.name: SequenceItem
childs.description: Sequence Item of DICOM IE Attribute

childs.name: codeValue
childs.description: Code Value

childs.name: codingSchemeDesignator
childs.description: Coding Scheme Designator

childs.name: codeMeaning
childs.description: Code Meaning

childs.name: CodePage
childs.description: data type of code page

childs.name: Sex
childs.description: data type for sex

childs.name: StudyStatus
childs.description:
PENDING (Performed Procedure Step Status : IN_PROGRESS)
OPEN (Performed Procedure Step Status : IN_PROGRESS)
DISCONTINUED (Performed Procedure Step Status : DISCONTINUED)
CLOSED (COMPLETED)
ARCHIVED (COMPLETED)

childs.name: ResultType
childs.description: Result Type

childs.name: ResultCode
childs.description: Result Code

childs.name: Result
childs.description: Execution result that occurs during DICOM communication

childs.name: type
childs.description: Result Type

childs.name: code
childs.description: Result Code

childs.name: ScheduledProcedureStepStatus
childs.description: A Real World condition that may affect the selection of the Scheduled Procedure Step.

childs.name: Filter
childs.description: Query filter of dicom data

childs.name: PatientFilter
childs.description: filter about patient

childs.name: addNameQuery
childs.description:
Value can be set by user in the worklist query.
Queried using Wildcard Matching

childs.name: addIDQuery
childs.description:
Value can be set by user in the worklist query.
Queried using Wildcard Matching

childs.name: addBirthDateQuery
childs.description:
Value can be set by user in the worklist query.
Queried using Range Based Matching.

childs.name: ScheduledProcedureStepFilter
childs.description:
filter about scheduled procedure step.
!!!Modality is Always set to "US"!!!

childs.name: addScheduledStationAETitle
childs.description: Queried using Single Value Matching.

childs.name: addScheduledProcedrueStepStartDateQuery
childs.description:
From-To range values can be set by user in the worklist query.
Queried using Range Based Matching.

childs.name: addScheduledPerformingPhysicianNameQuery
childs.description:
Value can be set by user in the worklist query.
Queried using Wildcard Matching.

childs.name: addScheduledProcedureStepDescriptionQuery
childs.description:
Value can be set by user in the worklist query.
Queried using Wildcard Matching.

childs.name: StudyFilter
childs.description: filter about study

childs.name: SeriesFilter
childs.description: filter about series

childs.name: UltrasoundImageFilter
childs.description: filter about ultrasoundimage

childs.name: IE
childs.description: Information entity communicated with the DICOM server (images, patient/study information)

childs.name: generateUID
childs.description: generate UID for Information entity

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: root UID assigned to the company

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: the model serial number (assigned by the department)

childs.name: Patient
childs.description: data about patients

childs.name: firstName
childs.description:
first(family) name of a patient.
From worklist entry or user input

childs.name: middleName
childs.description:
middle name of a patient.
From worklist entry or user input

childs.name: lastName
childs.description:
last name of a patient.
From worklist entry or user input

childs.name: ID
childs.description:
ID of a patient.
From worklist entry or user input

childs.name: birthDate
childs.description:
birth date of a patient.
From worklist entry or user input

childs.name: sex
childs.description:
sex of a patient.
From worklist entry or user input, “M”, “F” or “O”

childs.name: weight
childs.description: weight of a patient

childs.name: confidenciality
childs.description: confienciality of a patient

childs.name: exams
childs.description: exams of a patient
add exam to the patient
childs.name: addExam

parameters.name: exam
parameters.description: exam that added to the patient

childs.name: Study
childs.description: data about studies

childs.name: date
childs.description:
a study date.
It is sent deviced by study date and study time
From worklist entry or generated automatically using the date of the patient's examination

childs.name: accession
childs.description: accession number of a physician

childs.name: referringPhysician
childs.description: referring physician of a physician

childs.name: description
childs.description:
study description.
Either from worklist entry “Requested Procedure Description” or user input

childs.name: instanceUID
childs.description:
instance uid of a study.
Either from worklist entry or generated automatically

childs.name: ID
childs.description:
ID of a study.
Generated automatically from current date and time

childs.name: physicianOfRecord
childs.description: physician of record of a physician

childs.name: status
childs.description: status of a study

childs.name: discontinuedReasons
childs.description: Discontinued reasons of a study
add discontinued reasons to the patient
childs.name: addDiscontinuedReason

parameters.name: discontinuedReason
parameters.description: discontinued reason that added to the patient

childs.description: clear discontinued reasons to the patient
childs.name: clearDiscontinuedReason
performedProcedureStepID
childs.description:
performed procedure step id of a study.
Auto generated from Patient ID + Time Stamp

childs.name: performedProcedureStepDescription
childs.description: performed procedure description of a study

childs.name: performedProcedureStepStartDate
childs.description:
performed procedure step start date of a study.
auto-genereated by executing startExam in the MPPSServer class

childs.name: performedProcedureStepEndDate
childs.description:
performed procedure step end date of a study.
auto-generated by executing updateExam in the MPPSServer class

childs.name: patient
childs.description: Patient holding this study

childs.name: serieses
childs.description: all serieses that are hold by this patient

childs.name: addSeries

parameters.name: series
parameters.description: series that are hold by this patient

childs.description: Scheduled procedure step sequence

parameters.description: scheduled procedure step to be added

childs.description: clear scheduled procecure step to a study
childs.name: clearScheduledProcedureSteps
requestedProcedure

childs.description: Scheduled Procedure for Modality Worklist

childs.name: modality

childs.name: startDate
childs.description: Scheduled Procedure Step Start Date and Time.

childs.name: performingPhysiciansName

childs.description: Scheduled Procedure Step Description

childs.name: RequestedProcedure
childs.description: Requested Procedure for Modality Worklist

childs.name: ID
childs.description: Requested Procedure ID

childs.name: description
childs.description: Requested Procedure Description

childs.name: Series
childs.description: data about series

childs.name: modality
childs.description:
modality of a physician
Default value is "US"

childs.name: date
childs.description:
data of a series..
It is sent devided by series date and sereis time.
Generated automatically using the date of the patient's examination

childs.name: bodyPartExamined
childs.description: body part examined of a physician

childs.name: instanceUID
childs.description: instance uid of a series

childs.name: number
childs.description: series number

childs.name: exam
childs.description: Exam holding this series

childs.name: ultrasoundImage
childs.description: all ultrasound iamges that are hold by this patient

parameters.name: ultrasoundImage
parameters.description: ultrasound Image that are hold by this series

childs.name: Equipment
childs.description: equipment information of the DICOM

childs.name: manufacturer
childs.description:
Manufacturer of the equipment.
Default value is "FCU"

childs.name: modelName
childs.description:
Manufacturer's model name of the equipment.
Default value is "SC1"

childs.name: protocolName
childs.description:
Protocol name of the equipment.
Default value is "FCU"

childs.name: UltrasoundImage
childs.description: ultrasound image data that can be sent to dicom
add ultrasound image to the series
childs.name: initialize
childs.return: whether the function execution is successful

parameters.name: imagePaths
parameters.description: ultrasound Image path that is saved in the local machine

parameters.name: outputMsg
parameters.description: Reasons when an error occurs in a function

childs.name: instanceUID
childs.description: instance uid of ultrasound image

childs.name: burnedInAnnotation
childs.description:
burned in annotation.
Default value is "YES"

childs.name: series
childs.description: series holding this ultrasound image
